org.ow2.chameleon.core.utils

Class FrameworkManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.chameleon.core.utils.FrameworkManager

  • public class FrameworkManager
extends Object
    Framework keeper. Responsible for creating the OSGi framework instance.
    Version:
    $Id: 1.0.4 $Id
    Author:
    The OW2 Chameleon Team

        Returns:
        the Bundle Context.
        Throws:
